content: if you like a challenging pattern that keeps your interest this pattern is right for you it has many different textured stitches that create this beautiful blanket the pattern will look gorgeous using not only few different solid colors but also ombre one solid color it really looks amazing in one solid color self striping with long color changes like mandala caron cakes sirdar color wheel or sirdar snuggly pattercake or long gradient yarn you can use this pattern to create any size square blanket or you can join squares together to create a stunning king size bed cover the pattern includes detailed descriptions stitch guide video tutorial pictures after every few rounds and to demonstrate the final result **skill level ** intermediate **terminology ** us **the pattern includes ** * detailed descriptions stitch guide video tutorial video tutorial for each round pictures after every few rounds and to demonstrate the final result **yarn and size of sample ** yarn red heart super saver ombre / spearmint yarn weight #5 worsted/aran hook size 5 mm sample size 44 rounds -
